Subject: ERROR 502 Bad Gateway nginx
Description:
Hello,

Customer name is AsiaBank.
They've upgraded EPP server to the latest version 2 days ago, and it worked well, so they deleted the snapshot.
But today their server returned ERROR 502 Bad Gateway nginx, and only server reboot through hypervisor help.
Could you please assist ASAP?
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter an issue with the EPP UI. 

The use the EPP server 5.9.4.1 

The php-fpm service was down
Next_Steps__c:
We scheduled a remote session.
In the session we performed a server optimisation. 
Client needs to monitor the situation for a couple of days.

An ADO has been raised for this issue. We also received a feedback an we scheduled a new session for tomorrow to perform the steps provided by the R&D team.

We had a new remote session where we assist the customer to migrate the data with system backup v2 to a new machine.

They monitored the issue for a couple of days and the issue appeared on the new server. 

We have update the ADO with the new details and we are waiting for the R&D team to provide us solution.

Scheduled a new remote session to perform the steps provided by the R&D team.

The issue was not reproduced during the last remote, they will monitor the situation.

We are performing a new followup to the customer to check if the situation persist.

We have agreed with the CSS that since the issue has been confirmed as solved, the case can be closed.
Solution_Comment__c: issue has been solved in a remote session and customer confirmed the fix.
